name: Spiderman (FAN GAME) 2D
description:
This is a spider-man game in which you can: Swing, Climb walls. The game at the moment is only to relax for a while and has no purpose. The game as sprites of (spiderman, Webs) are made entirely by me, and as the programming is also done by me, the rest I removed from the internet.

I know the game has bugs but I'm trying to fix them. 

If you find a bug feel free to say so in the comments.

I would really appreciate if you try it :)

CONTROLS: (W, A, S, D): Move the player.

(E): Swing (Only if you are in the air). 

(Zooms to a wall): Climb walls. 

(Press twice (D, A, W)): An impulse in that direction (it has no animations).

In this moment is avaible:

-Windows.
